body.name: USX MOUNT Full Motion TV Wall Mount for Most 47-84 inch Flat Screen/LED/4K TV, Mount Bracket Dual Swivel Articulating Tilt 6 Arms, Max VESA 600x400mm, Holds up to 132lbs, Fits 8” 12” 16" Wood Studs
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 2 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 16 hrs 17 mins
features: UNIVERSAL DESIGN: This full motion TV mount fits for most of 47-84inch TVs up to 132lbs with VESA size 200*100mm to 600*400mm available and max 16" Wood Stud space.

ADJUSTABLE VIEW COMFORTABLE This TV bracket with dual articulating arms includes +5° /-15° tilt, ±45°swivel( maximum swivel angle depends on your TV), +/-3° post-installation adjustment allows the perfect TV leveling. All these will make your TV flexibility and better view based on your seat in the room.

EASY TO INSTALLATION Easy installation with detailed instruction and all included hardware in pre-labeled bags(Remarks can help you distinguish which screw you should use). Warm tips: In order to avoid customer misusing concrete anchors onto wood studs or drywall directly causing any safety issues, we removed concrete anchors from our package. If you need 10X50mm concrete anchors , please contact us to get it which be sent from USA.
SAVING SPACE This full motion TV wall bracket can pull out to 16.49 and retract back to 2.40”, which save some valuable space for you and make your house look neat and Max weight 132lbs.
PRODUCT INCLUDES Comes with bubble level, 3 pieces pack of cable ties and all standard mounting hardware, 10-year friendly US-based customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's awesome and well worth it.
reviews.reviewText: I literally gave nothing bad to say about this. The instructions were clear, the screws were all individually packed and labeled as were the instructions so I didn't even need the video, which they also include a link to. Didn't even have to take a picture because it's exactly what you see in the description and feels incredibly heavy duty. It fit my 65 inch samsung perfectly and I trust it to hold 100%

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mount. Used for 65” Samsung
reviews.reviewText: Would have been way faster to install if stud finder wasn’t messing up. Works great. Full motion and holds the tv super securely. Installed directly in to studs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY STRONG HOLDS MY 75 INCH TV
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this TV mount for my 75-inch TV, and I must say, I am thoroughly impressed with its strength and reliability. The build quality is exceptional, providing me with the confidence that my sizable television is securely mounted.Installation was a breeze, and the provided instructions were clear and easy to follow. What sets this mount apart is its robust design; it exudes durability, making me feel assured that my TV is in safe hands. The mount holds the 75-inch TV firmly in place without any wobbling or instability.I appreciate the versatility of the mount, allowing for various adjustments to achieve the perfect viewing angle. It not only offers a sleek and minimalistic look but also ensures that my TV stays securely attached to the wall.In summary, this TV mount exceeded my expectations, proving to be a reliable and robust solution for larger TVs. If you're in search of a strong and durable mount to support your substantial television, I highly recommend giving this product a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This mount is so easy to install and it really sticks to the wall.
reviews.reviewText: This thing was easy to put on my wall and it sticks on really well. But, I gotta say, it's smaller than what I pictured in my head. Still, it does the job fine, just wish it was a tad bigger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A really good TV wall mount.
reviews.reviewText: The mount is well made. The installation instructions are pretty thorough and the installation is straightforward and easy. I am very happy with this product. I liked it enough to buy a second one.I would REALLY REALLY REALLY like to give it 5 stars.Unfortunately, I have to dock it a star.I made the mistake of starting to install the mount without making sure that all of its parts were in the box. Alas... I was close to finishing the installation when I discovered that a needed part was nowhere to be found. Not the best time for this to happen, half of it was already bolted to the wall. Disappointed? Yes. But these things happen. Things can slip through the QA cracks. As long as their customer service can rectify the situation, I'm still a happy customer.I look through the documents in the box for the customer service information. Turns out that I was 20 minutes past the hours that they were open to take phone calls. But they did have an email address! Yay me! I sent them a quick email about the missing part, and figured that at the earliest that I would get a reply from them would be the next day or more likely many days later. To my surprise, an hour or so later, they emailed me back requesting some more info 😀. It only took a couple of emails and they agreed to send a new part. At this point, I'm a super happy camper. Everything was handled by customer service in one evening. KUDOS to the people in the customer service department!The next day, I decided to order another of the same mount for another TV. After all, I like the mount, and I was impressed with how their customer service responded to my problem. That day I also received a notice that a shipping label was produced to ship my part! Again, yay for me!Here's where they loose the star.I received the 2nd mount that I ordered that same day! I made sure that it included all the parts that it was supposed to have, and it did. So I took the part that I needed, and used it to finish installing the 1st mount. Set the 2nd mount aside and waited for the replacement part to come in so that I could install the 2nd mount.So far, I'm happy as a clam. But then it took nearly TWO WEEKS for the part to leave the shipper! I have no way of knowing whether it was their shipping department or USPS dropped the ball at this point. A miscommunication between the shipper and USPS, or something else. What I do know is that the shipping department didn't feel the need to let me know that there would be a delay.If not for me ordering a 2nd mount and it arriving very quickly, I would have been stuck with having half of a TV mount bolted to my living room wall and my TV sitting on my couch. That would have blown monkey nuts.Quality of TV mount: 5 starsCustomer service: 5 starsWhoever in their shipping department that took nearly 2 weeks to send the part: not 5 stars and the employees in customer service should mock him or her.I would only dock them a half star, but there's no option for that. If I need a 3rd TV mount, I will buy it from them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a phenomenal mount, however...
reviews.reviewText: So, I'll just get into the pros and cons.Pros:1. This mount is made of high quality materials and it very heavy and durable.2. The TV sits pretty flat on the wall.3. Comes with every piece of hardware that you should need.4. It comes with a template that is very useful and makes mounting way easier.5. Great instructions. Easy to understand and follow.6. You can move this mount around very easily, if you need to.Cons:1. The mount is kind of confusing to adjust (tilt), but once you figure it out, you'll be fine.2. See picture 2. This mount could stand to be 2-3 inches in width. This will help if the joists aren't true. I figured out the hard way that mine weren't. I ended up using flat stock with holes to extend the mount (not recommending anybody to do this, but I'm pretty handy and confident that the mount is secure to the wall).Overall, I give the mount a 4.8/5 and that just because of the modifications that I had to do, so that I could use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for my 75”
reviews.reviewText: Seems to be well made and my tv hasn’t fallen off the wall yet so I’m a happy customer. It was easy to install as I’ve installed a lot of wall mounts so that helped. I think anyone with even no experience could install this with the right tools. Great price for this as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality Mount
reviews.reviewText: My husband hung this mount fairly easy and fast. It holds our 65" tv well with no issues. The range of motion exceeded by expectations. It pulls out and turns side to side, not much of a tilt downward. Great quality and I would 100% recommend this product.
Buen y exelente compra se be de buen material y presentable buena calidad y se ve resistente y buen precio gracias.
Me parece un producto de buena calidad
